atmbranchfinderspring.resourceserver.authentication

Class AuthenticationManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • atmbranchfinderspring.resourceserver.authentication.AuthenticationManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationManager

    @Component
public class AuthenticationManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationManager
    Default implementation of the AuthenticationManager interface

      • getJWTVerifier

        public com.auth0.jwt.JWTVerifier getJWTVerifier()
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationManager
        Returns JWT verifier from Auth0 package. TPPs send in JWTs which are signed with ES256, the verifier makes sure the JWT is signed properly.
        Specified by:
        getJWTVerifier in interface AuthenticationManager
        Returns:
        Auth0 JWTVerifier
        See Also:
        JWTVerifier

      • isRequestTokenValid

        public boolean isRequestTokenValid(java.lang.String token)
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationManager
        Checks if incoming access token exists, has the right 'grant' and is not expired. RequestTokens are just AccessTokens that are only used to POST an account-request. These are not valid for resource retrieval.
        Specified by:
        isRequestTokenValid in interface AuthenticationManager
        Parameters:
        token - ID string
        Returns:
        Boolean
        See Also:
        AccessToken

      • isAccessTokenValid

        public boolean isAccessTokenValid(java.lang.String token,
                                  Permission requiredPermission)
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationManager
        Checks if in coming access token exists in the repository, has the right 'grant', permissions, and is not expired. These tokens can be used to access protected resources.
        Specified by:
        isAccessTokenValid in interface AuthenticationManager
        Parameters:
        token - ID string
        requiredPermission - Permission needed for endpoint data.
        Returns:
        Boolean
